original_text: But if another man has had sex with you, 21 may the Lord bring the curse on you. The bitter water will cause your female parts to become smaller. Your stomach will become very big.
korean_text: 그러나 네가 네 남편을 두고 탈선하여 몸을 더럽혀서 네 남편 아닌 사람과 동침하였으면

sentences.original_text: But if another man has had sex with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 다른 남자가 당신과 성관계를 가졌다면

sentences.original_text: may the Lord bring the curse on you
The bitter water will cause your female parts to become smaller
sentences.korean_translation: 쓴 물이 당신의 여성 부위를 작아지게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Your stomach will become very big
